Home.Welcome: We are preparing for our wedding, ready to welcome you to celebrate our union. Many of you have asked us for the gifts list, so you too can get ahead if you wish to participate.
Home.Greetings:
Whatever your choose, we are infinitely grateful for your generosity and love.
We are very excited to see you and share our special day with you.

Remember to RSVP at the following link.

See you soon!

Gifts.Message:
We are planning to move to France in 2024.
We selected two stores and suggestions for each country.

The IKEA purchases will be sent directly to France.
The items bought in LIVERPOOL will be delivered in México.
Gifts.InfoIKEA:
*If you choose a gift from the IKEA site, be sure to:
- browse the French site (https://www.ikea.com/fr/fr/)
- send it to a collect point (in Paris, near Stalingrad or Jaurès subway station, see image below) where it will be picked up by the groom's family (therefore in the name of SOCCOL/DRUET)
- let us know when making a purchase so that we can update the list

Account.Message:
Another option, perhaps more comfortable for some, is to transfer money to a bank account that we decided to open as savings for the arrival in our new home.
Below you can find all the account information.
